items.name: Scroll Service (1/Dia)
entries: As an action, Dagdra draws a {@item spell scroll} from her {@item documancy satchel|AI}. The scroll contains a spell of up to 3rd level of Dagdra's choice. Only Dagdra can use the scroll, which vanishes after 1 minute.

trait.name: Reach
entries: The tentacle can abast anywhere in the room.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 35 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) de dany contundent, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the tentacle can't constrict another target.

items.name: Acid Spray Gun {@recharge 5}
entries: The hobgoblin sprays acid in a 10-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 10 Destresa saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany d'àcid on a failed save; si supera, en rep la meitat.
The spray gun has a tank that can be filled with ten standard vials of acid mixed with water, allowing it to be used five times.

items.name: Relative Size
entries: Any damage Onyx would take is reduced to 0. She has advantage on ability checks and saving throws.

items.name: Dealing with Onyx
entries: Onyx cannot be overcome or killed by combat. Any weapon attack against her that hits AC 12 makes contact but deals no lasting damage. However, if the attack would deal 10 or more damage, Onyx has disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of her next turn. If Onyx would take 10 or more damage from spells or other effects, it yields the same result. Spells that impose conditions function normally against Onyx, but those conditions end automatically at the end of the cat's next turn.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany tallant.

monster.name: Replica Duodrone

items.name: Dismantlable
entries: If the replica duodrone dies, its body falls into a pile of parts (gears, plates, screws, and wires), leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

languages: can understand Common but speaks only preprogrammed responses

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany contundent.
